TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void PropertyTranslator(object host, string propertyName, object value);
.class public auto ansi sealed PropertyTranslator extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub PropertyTranslator(host As Object, propertyName As String, value As Object)
public delegate void PropertyTranslator(System::Object ^ host, System::String ^ propertyName, System::Object ^ value);
type PropertyTranslator = delegate of obj * string * obj -> unit

param.name: host
param.span: 正在映射其属性的宿主控件。

span.span: The host control whose property is being mapped.
The host control is either a or an .
The name of the property being translated.
The new value of the property.

summary.span: 为宿主控件的映射属性提供转换功能。

span.span: Provides a translation function for a mapped property of the host control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使用委托 来实现和之间的属性映射 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 。The delegate is used by the class to implement property mapping between [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping).
